author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...THE 13TH TROPICAL STORM OF THE SEASON FORMS OVER THE CENTRAL CARIBBEAN SEA... ...HURRICANE WATCH ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF HAITI...
summary: ...THE 13TH TROPICAL STORM OF THE SEASON FORMS OVER THE CENTRAL CARIBBEAN SEA... ...HURRICANE WATCH ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF HAITI... As of 11:00 AM EDT Tue Oct 21 the center of Melissa was located near 14.3, -71.7 with movement W at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
